body:
ok guys picture this tho.

andi mack skam au.

it honestly fits really well and i kinda hate it? anyway let’s begin

Season 1:

andi is eva. season one really is about her and her family weirdness, but also very centric around her relationship with jonah, aka jonas. she has stolen the boyfriend of her ex-best friend, amber (ingrid), and she has no friends going into high school. there she meets buffy(noora), who is a total badass and her instant bff. she soon becomes friends with cyrus (isak) through her bf jonah, and they form a tight-knit group of friends. what andi doesn’t know is that cyrus has a massive crush on jonah and will do everything in his power to break them up, even though it’s super shitty of them. not all of it is cyrus’ fault tho. jandi, like jonas/eva, is super toxic and jonah keeps lying to andi about his panic attacks, causing a huge rift in their relationship. meanwhile, buffy is constantly being challenged by a cocky asshole named marty (william). andi meets marty’s friend walker (p chris) at a party and they kiss. by the end of season one, andi and buffy find something on cyrus’s phone that alludes to him being gay. (ps. i can’t figure out what to do with vilde and i know she’s important but there’s no characters left)

season 2:

this season is about buffy/noora. marty, being the party animal he is, throws crazy parties and invites andi and her friends in an attempt to get closer to buffy. andi is still with walker. i don’t remember much of the details from season 2 bc it’s been a while, but anyway, stuff happens buffy sings to marty and sleeps over at his house and ah… and buffy’s like “i hate u” and marty is like “i love u” and then they are like yas and move to phoenix together bc i think that happened when noorhelm moved to london? (ps. haha i also can’t figure out sana! yikes! she’s rly important too)

season 3:

cyrus is my boy isak. cy meets iris at a party and they start their little “fling”. cy has been helping jonah handle his panic attacks, jonah has a panic attack at the party and has to rush out. amber witnesses the whole thing, and threatens to tell andi if he doesn’t go to an event she’s holding with her friends. he goes and sees tj, a beautiful elusive blond, and he starts hanging out with him regularly. cy is still dating iris but is strongly beginning to think he is gay. tj has a random shitty gf that keeps messing shit up. also, either tj has bipolar disorder, or that could be slightly changed to maybe reflect his learning disability? but regardless he and cy get together and be in love the end.

season 4:

i don’t have a sana! so i wouldn’t know what to write here!

Conclusion:

i kinda got tired of writing this so i slacked off on detail a bit toward the end. so that’s all, if anybody wants to discuss this with me, i would love to talk about it! i think it’s kind of interesting how the stories compliment each other. please let me know your thoughts, or if you have any ideas for characters i could assign or change, tell me :)

summary: TJ was never confirmed to gay. I feel like people just ship Tyrus so that there can be a gay couple and not just for the...
question: TJ was never confirmed to gay. I feel like people just ship Tyrus so that there can be a gay couple and not just for the "feelings" they have for each other.
answer: I don’t really see TJ gay either, but if they became a thing, I wouldn’t mind it. But of course some people would want a gay couple, Disney never has them and this is the first time someone is actually CONFIRMED gay. On the other hand, some of Tyrus’s looks to Cyrus is pretty homosexual my friend.

summary: Why did they have to put Walker and Buffy sorta-together and then have Andi act like she likes him still? Why does Buffy have to...
question: Why did they have to put Walker and Buffy sorta-together and then have Andi act like she likes him still? Why does Buffy have to suffer through drama for Andi to realize she likes Walker or for her and Walker to finally get together? I’m so confused, the writers seem like they’re constantly backtracking. I’m chill with Andi still liking Walker but I’m not chill with Buffy getting hurt in the process.
answer:
Why did Buffy have to endure TJ being a jerk to her, just for his redemption arc and Tyrus? Why did Marty’s abrupt S2 departure lead to her not getting decent plot lines? Why was Buffy’s moving plot line not even really about Buffy?

Here’s to hoping with the girls basketball team, we actually see Buffy have another story line that’s purely her own (last time she did, it was when her mom came back)
